serializedexecution

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • serializedexecution.Subject
      • serializedexecution.ConfigurationManager

  • public class ConfigurationManager
extends Subject
    The class ConfigurationManager extends Subject (Subject is used to implement the design pattern Observer). It provides an interface to link database and GUI.

      boolean setConfigurationFromRow(java.util.ArrayList<Row> rows)
      Insert a configuration passed as ArrayList in the ArrayList element.
      void write()
      After removing the blank spaces and after checking for the validity of a configuration the new configuration contained in the private attribute "element" is written into database.
